Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. After careful consideration, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its intrinsic worth, providing you with an excellent opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a favorable rate. I look forward to your response and the possibility of discussing the details further. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,350,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,350,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
